newsitem.title: DENMARK: Lauritzen sells equipment unit to Iceland.
newsitem.headline: Lauritzen sells equipment unit to Iceland.

text.p: Danish shipping group J.Lauritzen A/S said on Thursday its 50 percent-owned Sabroe Refrigeration unit signed a letter of intent to sell its Carnitech company to Iceland's Marel HF for an undisclosed sum.
The deal was subject to the customary due diligence stipulations, with the aim of concluding the deal in April, Lauritzen said.

Marel is an Icelandic producer of equipment for the food industry, notably fish processing companies and has 200 employees and five subsidiaries in the United States, one in Canada, one in Denmark as well as one in Iceland.
Carnitech is a leading provider of equipment for the prawn industry in North America, Norway and Greenland, it said.
